title: The Commander And The Den Asaan Rautu Vol 2
description: After the commander and Den Asaan are summoned to Diras to defend the Frewyn capital from a Thellisian invasion, they learn that Thellis is working with Gallei to destroy their kingdom. Now with the help of a Haanta magi, a head cleric, a Lucentian assassin, an arrogant Livanon captain, and King Alasdair's armed forces, the commander and Den Asaan go to war with the largest nation on the Two Continents, but will their success unite the Haanta and Frewyn at last, or will it spark unexpected animosities?
author: Michelle Franklin
